New Records: Australia set the highest-ever T20 international first powerplay score of 113/1 for the opening six overs.
Key Match Events: Travis Head smashed 80 off 25 balls as Australia chased down Scotland's 154 to win inside 10 overs.
Mitchell Marsh smashed 30 off one over from Jack Jarvis.
Head reached his half century from just 17 balls.
Wicketkeeper Josh Inglis' quick-fire unbeaten 27 helped earn Australia a seven-wicket victory with 62 balls to spare.
Sean Abbott was the pick of the Australia bowlers with three for 39.
